events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to return it and get a full refund.
The system marked the issue as Refund based on keywords like 'return' and 'refund' found in the customer message.
Assigning the case to refund specialist agent Emily for further assistance with the return request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 4523789. The jacket is brand new, I haven't worn it yet, and it still has all tags attached.
Thanks for the details. We have initiated your refund process. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label attached to your email.
I received the return label and will ship the jacket today. Thanks for the quick help and clear instructions.
We have processed your refund in full and credited the amount back to your original payment method. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since there has been no further response, we are closing this refund case. Please contact us anytime if you need more help.
